error.signature: Stack is in ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state and can not be updated

verdict.summary: CloudFormation stack failed creation and rolled back. Can't update — must delete and recreate.

dead_ends.action: Try to update the stack anyway
dead_ends.why_fails: AWS API rejects updates to ROLLBACK_COMPLETE stacks

dead_ends.action: Manually create the resources outside CloudFormation
dead_ends.why_fails: Resources drift from IaC — hard to manage

workarounds.action: Delete the failed stack and recreate: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name X
Check the Events tab to find why creation failed, then fix the template
workarounds.how: aws cloudformation describe-stack-events --stack-name X | jq '.StackEvents[] | select(.ResourceStatus == "CREATE_FAILED")'

workarounds.action: Use --on-failure DO_NOTHING to debug without rollback next time
workarounds.how: Use --on-failure DO_NOTHING to debug without rollback next time

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Stack is in ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state and can not be' is a deployment_error error while 'An error occurred (AccessDenied) when calling the ' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
